text: (born October 13, 1964) is a former Japanese professional baseball player. He played for the Yakult Swallows in the Japan Central League. He later played for the Kintetsu Buffaloes of the Japan Pacific League. He ended playing with the Yokohama BayStars of the Japan Central League ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Baseball people from Yokohama Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Nippon Professional Baseball outfielders Category:Nippon Professional Baseball Rookie of the Year Award winners Category:Yakult Swallows players Category:Kintetsu Buffaloes players Category:Yokohama BayStars players Category:Japanese baseball coaches Category:Nippon Professional Baseball coaches Category:Baseball players at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic baseball players of Japan Category:Olympic gold medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1984 Summer Olympics
title: Yukio Arai
